attributes.action: raise the pay for members of HM Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some service personnel that are serving overseas don’t receive enough pay to say that they are putting their lives on the line. Some people of certain professions simply get paid too much for example footballers! The Army starts you off on £15,000 a year after training! I know about Government cutbacks but £15,000 is taking the Mick! I am asking for the Government to increase the pay of serving soldiers and to give the injured soldiers better care and support.
